title.rendered: Amla 500 ML Juice for Immunity booster, Hair care and Skin care

content.rendered:
• Regular consumption of AMLA JUICE may contribute to healthy hair and skin, thanks to Amla’s nourishing and rejuvenating effects.
  • AMLA JUICE supports immune system function with its rich vitamin C content, helping the body defend against illnesses and infections.
  • The vitamin C and other nutrients in AMLA JUICE play a role in promoting overall energy and vitality, contributing to a sense of well-being.
  • Amla is traditionally used in Ayurveda to support digestive health, and the juice may help alleviate occasional Acidity, indigestion and digestive discomfort.

Benefits

  • Amla juice is rich in vitamin C, which helps boost the immune system and fight infections.
  • Amla juice helps with digestion by increasing gastric juice release and improving nutrient absorption. It’s also a good source of dietary fiber.
  • Skin: Amla juice’s vitamin C content can help prevent UV damage and encourage collagen formation, which can improve skin health.
  • Hair: Amla juice can help prevent hair loss and promote hair growth by strengthening hair follicles.
  • Eyes: Amla juice can help improve eye health and lower the risk of cataracts and age-related macular degeneration.
  • Liver: Amla juice is high in antioxidants and has anti-inflammatory properties.

Directions:  Take 15ml of Amla Juice on empty stomach twice a day with equal amount of water or as directed by physician.

Ingredients: Amla Juice.

Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
